### Checklist before requesting a review

- [ ] I have followed the [Conventional Commit](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/en/v1.0.0) messages for the PR title
- [ ] I have included Jira ticket number in the PR title
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have added thorough tests for new functionalities
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have followed the [branching strategy](https://confluence.collab.test-and-trace.nhs.uk/display/EAE/Branching+Strategy+Documentation)
- [ ] I have addressed all linting issues raised by MegaLinter
